div.p: A message from High School Principal Mr. Morris
As a small community, we cherish the values that bind our community together and provide an education that brings the world to our doorstep.
Our common goal to offer every student the highest quality education possible drives us daily.

ul.li: Treat one another with kindness and respect
Build relationships that will last a lifetime
Seek out and adopt new ideas and best practices from around the globe
Prepare students for a rapidly changing world

dl.p: Nothing from Sunday, April 26 to Tuesday, May 26.

li.a: On My Way: Free Child Care

div.class: pum pum-overlay pum-theme-315 pum-theme-lightbox popmake-overlay pum-click-to-close click_open
pum-container popmake theme-315 pum-responsive pum-responsive-medium responsive size-medium

div.p: If your child’s transportation changes, please fill out the Transportation Notice form.
For further transportation information, please contact Mark Lambertus at 812.952.2555 ext. 202
